title: Was JFK’s Speech in Netflix’s ‘The Crown’ Authentic?
subtitle: "What is it to be an American?" the fictional president asked during a visit to the U.K. in the second season of the popular Netflix drama. How true-to-life were his remarks?
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: A speech delivered by the fictional John F. Kennedy in an episode of "The Crown" was derived from real utterances by Kennedy.
